game.name: Variables 2
game.shortDescription: After two years of precipitation, we re-made this variable sequel after thinking about it! Variable 2 is a unique stand-alone tower defense game. We have enriched the building and elements of tower defense, and the experience in the game can be changed according to your ideas!
game.shortDescriptionEn: After two years of precipitation, we re-made this variable sequel after thinking about it! Variable 2 is a unique stand-alone tower defense game. We have enriched the building and elements of tower defense, and the experience in the game can be changed according to your ideas!

reviewHighlights.text: 전작인 variables의 도전과제를 모두 클리어할 정도로 오래 했었는지라 후속작인 variables2는 도전과제들 금방 달성한거 같습니다. 전작도 타워디펜스로써 재밌게 했었는데, 이번작은 기존보다 여러모로 훨씬 발전해서 즐겁게 했습니다. 특히 보스들마다 컷씬을 넣을줄...
